languages.text: "Я... помню". {n}Когда вы разжимаете хватку, друкари несколько мгновений смотрит на вас, чуть склонив голову.{/n} "Прежде чем я оставлю тебя... могу ли я просить о том, чтобы Иремерисс досталась мне?" {n}В его голосе — покладистость, которая одновременно кажется искренней и насмешливой.{/n}

"I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "Before I leave you... may I request that you leave Yremeryss to me?" {n}You hear supplication in his voice that seems sincere and mocking at the same time.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я... помню". {n}Когда вы разжимаете хватку, друкари несколько мгновений смотрит на вас, чуть склонив голову.{/n} "Прежде чем я оставлю тебя... могу ли я просить о том, чтобы Иремерисс досталась мне?" {n}В его голосе — покладистость, которая одновременно кажется искренней и насмешливой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "Before I leave you... may I request that you leave Yremeryss to me?" {n}You hear supplication in his voice that seems sincere and mocking at the same time.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "Before I leave you... may I request that you leave Yremeryss to me?" {n}You hear supplication in his voice that seems sincere and mocking at the same time.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我……我明白。”{n}当你松开手之后，玛拉斋盯着你看了几秒钟，微微低下了头。{/n}“在我离开之前……我可以恳求你将伊芮梅莉斯交给我吗？”{n}玛拉斋的话语充满了祈求的意味，既真诚，又满是嘲弄。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "Before I leave you... may I request that you leave Yremeryss to me?" {n}You hear supplication in his voice that seems sincere and mocking at the same time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我……我明白。”{n}当你松开手之后，玛拉斋依然在地上继续跪了几秒钟。随后，他站起身，看着你，微微低下了头。{/n}“在我离开之前……我可以恳求你将伊芮梅莉斯交给我吗？”{n}玛拉斋的话语充满了祈求的意味，甚至带着奴性。这样的语气听起来完全不合常理，但却又无比自然。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「あぁ…そうだ」{n}力を緩めると、デュカーリは数秒こちらを見つめてからほんの少し頭を下げた。{/n}「出て行く前に…イレメリスの事は俺に任せて欲しいと頼んでもいいか？」{n}その声色に切実な願いを感じた。誠実な雰囲気と挑発的な雰囲気が混在している。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "Before I leave you... may I request that you leave Yremeryss to me?" {n}You hear supplication in his voice that seems sincere and mocking at the same time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ…そうだ」{n}力を緩めると、デュカーリは数秒こちらを見つめてからほんの少し頭を下げた。{/n}「出て行く前に…イレメリスの事は俺に任せて欲しいと頼んでもいいか？」{n}その声色に切実な願いを感じた。誠実な雰囲気と挑発的な雰囲気が混在している。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Lo... sé». {n}Cuando aflojas la presa, el Drukhari te mira durante unos segundos con la cabeza inclinada ligeramente.{/n} «Antes de que me vaya... ¿puedo pedirte que dejes a Yremeryss en mis manos?». {n}La súplica de su voz es sincera y burlona a partes iguales.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "Before I leave you... may I request that you leave Yremeryss to me?" {n}You hear supplication in his voice that seems sincere and mocking at the same time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo... lo entiendo». {n}Cuando le sueltas, el drukhari permanece arrodillado durante unos segundos. Luego se pone en pie y te mira con la cabeza ligeramente inclinada.{/n} «Antes de irme... ¿puedo pedirte que me dejes Yremeryss a mí?». {n}Captas un tono de súplica e incluso docilidad en la voz de Marazhai, algo que no parece propio de él, pero que al mismo tiempo se te antoja completamente natural.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Je sais très bien où est ma place... » {n}Lorsque vous desserrez votre étreinte, le Drukhari vous fixe du regard l'espace de quelques instants, la tête légèrement inclinée.{/n} « Avant de partir... puis-je vous demander de me laisser m'occuper personnellement d'Yremeryss ? » {n}Vous percevez dans sa voix une supplique tout à la fois sincère et moqueuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "Before I leave you... may I request that you leave Yremeryss to me?" {n}You hear supplication in his voice that seems sincere and mocking at the same time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je sais très bien où est ma place... » {n}Lorsque vous desserrez votre étreinte, le Drukhari reste à genoux quelques secondes de plus, puis il se relève et vous regarde, la tête légèrement inclinée.{/n} « Avant de partir... puis-je vous demander de me laisser m'occuper personnellement d'Yremeryss ? » {n}Vous décelez dans le ton de Marazhai une note de supplication, voire de servilité. Bien qu'inhabituelle, elle semble tout à fait sincère.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... schon." {n}Als du deinen Griff lockerst, starrt dich der Drukhari noch einige Sekunden lang mit leicht gesenktem Kopf an.{/n} "Bevor ich gehe ... darf ich darum bitten, dass Ihr Yremeryss mir überlasst?" {n}Du erkennst ein Flehen in seiner Stimme, das gleichermaßen aufrichtig wie spöttisch zu sein scheint.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "Before I leave you... may I request that you leave Yremeryss to me?" {n}You hear supplication in his voice that seems sincere and mocking at the same time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... schon." {n}Als du deinen Griff lockerst, starrt dich der Drukhari noch einige Sekunden lang mit leicht gesenktem Kopf an.{/n} "Bevor ich gehe ... darf ich darum bitten, dass Ihr Yremeryss mir überlasst?" {n}Du erkennst ein Flehen in seiner Stimme, das gleichermaßen aufrichtig wie spöttisch zu sein scheint.
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "Before I leave you... may I request that you leave Yremeryss to me?" {n}You hear supplication in his voice that seems sincere and mocking at the same time.{/n}

languages.text: "Haddimi... Biliyorum." {n}Drukhari, elini bıraktığında birkaç saniyeliğine bakışlarını sana dikiyor. Başı hafifçe öne eğik.{/n} "Seni rahat bırakmadan önce... Senden Yremeryss'i bana bırakmanı isteyebilir miyim?" {n}Yalvarmaya kaçan, aynı anda hem samimi hem de alaycı bir tonla konuştuğunu işitiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "Before I leave you... may I request that you leave Yremeryss to me?" {n}You hear supplication in his voice that seems sincere and mocking at the same time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Haddimi... Biliyorum." {n}Drukhari, elini bıraktığında birkaç dakikalığına bakışlarını sana dikiyor. Başı hafifçe öne eğik.{/n} "Seni rahat bırakmadan önce... Senden Yremeryss'i bana bırakmanı isteyebilir miyim?" {n}Sesinde yalvarmaya kaçan, aynı anda hem samimi hem de alaycı bir ton işitiyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
